name: 東方氷佺暴 ~ Rampage of the Strongest!
name_original: 東方氷佺暴 ~ Rampage of the Strongest!
description:
WARNING!

THE STRONGEST CHALLENGER "CIRNO" IS APPROACHING!

Rampage of the Strongest is a high-speed caravan shoot-em-up featuring the strongest fairy of Gensokyo - the ice fairy Cirno!

Play as Cirno and pummel your way through the enemy-infested Misty Lake! Show those pesky fairies and frogs who's boss! And of course, don't forget to assert your dominance to your best-friend-slash-rival: the chief fairy Daiyousei!

Rampage of the Strongest features:

  • A high-intensity 99-second stage!
  • A dynamic RANK system that automatically adjusts the difficulty of the game based on your performance! Manage your rank carefully with well-timed bombs and self-destructs... or, alternatively, push it as high you can for the ultimate high-risk-high-reward experience!
  • 2 toggleable BGM arranges of Cirno's theme, Beloved Tomboyish Girl! (plus a bunch of other QoL options such as starting lives!)
  • A scoring system that encourages speedkilling and point-blanking, complete with score extends!
  • Re-bindable controls!
  • An in-game manual! (Plus a more in-depth one in the game directory!)

CREDITS:

  • GAME PROGRAMMER, DESIGNER AND ARTIST:
    • Kevin Minh (Kevinmonitor)
  • COMPOSERS:
    • Yal (@GameDevYal)
    • Wareya
  • SFX:
    • Made with bfxr
    • Some sounds obtained from Freesound.org (jobro, MATRIXXX_)
